structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ISSUANCE OF BONDS AND CONTROL OF FUNDS

law.catch_line: Bonds as negotiable instruments -- Presumption of validity.

text.section: Bonds lawfully authorized and issued by an issuer, subject to applicable provisions for registration or of the proceedings of the issuance, are negotiable instruments.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
